# device

**Instance Property**

The Metal device responsible for the layer’s drawable resources.

## Declaration

```swift
var device: (any MTLDevice)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines which device object Metal uses to create its [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Metal/MTLTexture] objects. When you retrieve a drawable object and its associated texture, you must render to the texture using the same device object.

The default value is `nil`—you must set the device for a layer before rendering.

## Related Documentation

- **Core Animation Programming Guide**
- **Metal Programming Guide**

## Configuring the Metal Device

- **preferredDevice**: The device object that the system recommends using for this layer.
